body.name: ROVSUN 2 Burner Outdoor Propane Gas Stove 150,000 BTU High Pressure Stand Cooker for Backyard Cooking Camping Home Brewing Canning Turkey Frying, 20 PSI Regulator

Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 56 mins
features: 150,000 BTU OUTPUT ★ Supplied with two separate burner, (75,000 BTU for each) you can cook much food in the same. Both burner has individual knob to control heat. Ideal to make family meals like frying fish/chicken, steaming crabs, wok cooking.
HEAT ADJUSTABLE ★ Flame can be adjusted by 20 PSI regulator which is CSA listed. Knob at the front allows for precise temperature control. Came with everything you need except the propane tank.
EFFORTLESS TO CARRY AROUND ★ Legs can be taken off in minutes, which is designed for easy transporting. Perfect for tailgating, camping, or just boiling corn or crabs at a back yard cookout!

WELL CONSTRUCTED ★ This sturdy burner which is made from cast iron can handle the heavy jobs. A superb supplement to the barbecue, a big pot of chili or stew, or a pot of boiling water for clams or crawdads.
EASY SETUP ★ Out of the box and assemble the legs without tools in minutes you are cooking. Measures 30.7’’Lx 15.7’’W x 29.7’’H, is fit for an adult height.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The burner puts out a lot of heat, which is great for outdoor cooking. Make it possible to fry outside where any mess is easier to handle. Also no smelling up your house with hot grease. Perfect for crawfish boil, steaming lobsters or crabs, deep frying a turkey and other big family meals on it. Just work with propane. Any other gas is not available. Why choose US?√ Affordable and high-quality item with responsible and round after-sales service.√ Directly getting your goods from our warehouse in CA/NJ/GA, faster order for faster shipment.√ Professional household appliance solution provider for catering your demand accurately.√ Open-minded for any feedbacks for inspiring us to move forward to bring customers a better purchasing experience.
Enjoy Outdoor Cooking! 150,000 BTU output Heat faster Stable frame

Air Control When flame is too yellow adjust here to let more oxygen in. CSA Approved Regulator Ensure safety and longer life time 75,000 BTU for Each Burner Separate heat adjustment for convenient usage

Easy Detachable Legs For convenient transport & storage Simple Knob Control Open the main valve, hold a long match next to the burner, turn the control valve Various Application A great tool for deep fried turkey and seafood boils outside on your deck or patio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The flame is great!
reviews.reviewText: The flame output on the stove is great! I have only used one side, so far. But, it heats up quickly.The knobs seem a little cheap. They're not tight and seem flimsy, but do work.The legs are sturdy enough, but are awkward to tighten.Overall, I truly love my new little stove!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Please DON'T buy before you read this! If I could put 0 stars, I would!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this product. The first time I turned it on, I smelled gas and I didn’t know where it was from. I bought a gas detector tool and used it and found that there was a leak. When I lit the stove up I saw an open flame on the border of the grill, not at the burner where it’s supposed to be! This is an enormous safety hazard. Clearly the product is defective. Amazon connected me with the seller and they have been dragging the communication on for months. If the product is defective, you can ask for a refund per their return policy. They asked me whether the product is loose. It is not loose but it is not the customer's job to fix a product that is brand new. It is the responsibility of the manufacturer to ensure that their product is tested for safety before shipping the product to the consumer. I am appalled that this company sent a defective product and did not complete an inspection beforehand. Even further, that they expected a customer to fix a product that is flammable and dangerous. This could have had disastrous consequences for me and my family and I am extremely dissatisfied with the customer service, the utter disregard and lack of care for their customer's lives. I will try to work with Amazon again to resolve this issue.
